datoCmsEvent.title: ROK X MEETCUTE X SORORITY PRESENTS: VDAY ARTISTIC SPEED DATING

children.value:
About this Event
Hungry for new collaborators? Looking to expand your community? Want to connect with like-minded queer theatre workers?
Join us for a Valentine's Day Mash-Up of three orgs! Ring of Keys, MeetCute and SORORITY are joining forces for a night of meeting old friends, new collaborators, and all in between! Join us for an evening of virtual artistic speed dating, community expanding and so much more.
Facilitator Bios:
MeetCute (founded and run by Los Angeles directors Katie Lindsay and Hannah Wolf) is a community building organization rooted in inclusive practices, partnering artists and serving the Los Angeles theatre community. Learn more at

SORORITY started as a late night k-hole for new short works by women, trans and queer performing artists working in Los Angeles. Founded, curated and hosted by Gina Young, SORORITY exploded almost overnight from a small salon into a huge and supportive community of creators with a cult following. SORORITY events defy description and spark conversation, and we've produced hundreds of artists at venues including The Hammer Museum, Rockwell, and Los Angeles Performance Practice's LAX Festival. During this time of COVID-19 and social distancing, SORORITY is now on Zoom and YouTube. www.sororitytheaterprojects.com
Instagram- @meet.cute.la and Facebook
SORORITY- @sororitytheatre
